Title: Julia Says
Writer: Robia Rashid (created by), Brian Tanen, Dennis Saldua (executive story editor), Ava Tramer (story editor), Michael Oppenhuizen (staff writer), Jen Regan (staff writer)
Actors: Jennifer Jason Leigh, Keir Gilchrist, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Amy Okuda
Plot: Sam decides to update his look. Casey learns a family secret. Feeling like her family no longer needs her, Elsa seeks attention elsewhere.
